name: Build the Mac Pro That You Wish Apple Released
caption: lifehacker.com
description: Last week Apple updated their Mac Pros to cutting-edge processors from 2010, even older graphics cards, and all the USB 2.0 ports you'll ever need.  With a proper update unlikely until 2013, we thought we'd bridge the gap with Hackintoshesâ€”the faster, cheaper Mac desktops you can build...
